entry.title: How to download WBS element or WBS element overview report in SAP S/4Hana Public Cloud
entry.content:
Greetings, 

I need to export Work Breakdown Structure (WBS) elements to Excel for projects already in the system. I'm looking for a method other than using the migration template. Alternatively, is there a standard report that displays WBS elements for all projects?

entry.title: Transport the GL account with implementation status "do not used" into TST and PRD system?
entry.content:
Hi Expert,

Understand that GL account with implementation status "do not used" will not be transported into TST and PRD system.

However, i am getting error below when displaying the configuration in TST system because the GL account implementation status is "do not used". Hence, any chance that i can trsnport it to TST and PRD without removing the SAP standard configuration?

entry.title: Need to update HSN code in PR/PO during creation from ARIBA Guided Buying to SAP S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD
entry.content:
Dear All,

We are trying to integrate PR from ARIBA GUIDED BUYING to SAP S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD and further create PO.

We have created PR in SAP S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD. Further using Automatic PO creation app, we are creating PO. 

For india country, we have BR_NCM field for HSN code in PO item. But the same field is not available in PR item. How we can achieve this updating of HSN/SAC code in PO India tab from ARIBA GB.

Is there anyway, can we directly initiate creation of PO from ARIBA GB ? If no, what we can do for HSN code field?

Regards

Sudharsanan

entry.title: Error during creation of business partner from ARIBA SLP to S4HANA
entry.content:
Hi All

I am getting below error message during creation of vendor in S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD from ARIBA SLP.

Error - Entry VN does not exist in TPAR (check entry)

Error - In table TPAER, the entry SUPL VN is missing

Error - Mandatory functions not yet fully maintained

Partner role VN maintain in below configurations

1) Permissible partner per account group

2) Define supplier partner determination procedure

3) Assign partner schema to vendor account group

4) Define VN in Purchasing document partner determination procedure

5) Assign partner schema to PO document type

Kindly advice on this issue

Regards

Sudharsanan

entry.title: Custom report based on Material Classification
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I have assigned the Classification to the material which Includes Colour, Brand, Cat 1 and Cat 2 based on the Classification there's no Standard report available in Public cloud, so is there any possibility to develop a Custom report based on Classification. If so, does the Classification data of the Material need to affected in any transaction data like PO, GRN and so on.. to develop a Custom report ?. 

Best regards,

Dinesh

entry.title: Margin Analysis Allocation context error - Not authorized to perform the action MANAGE_ALLOC_V2/057
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

Does anybody know why the following error message pop-ups when creating an allocation cycle with context "Margin Analysis" in the app "Manage allocations"?

Not authorized to perform the action (MANAGE_ALLOC_V2/057)

In the starter system it worked perfectly. We are about to open a note to SAP because we fulfill all the requirements and in fact the mentioned object we have it as unrestricted.

Thanks. Regards,

entry.title: workflow approval process
entry.content:
Hello experts,

 

As we are using Public cloud for creating a purchase request for users we have created a BTP workflow approval before it reaches to SAP .

 

However, after the approval process done from Btp same people have to approve also for purchase order for that it happens double the time and creating kind of double work for approvers.

 

Is there any way that we can restrict the approval process for Purchase requested that comes from only  Btp after approval

entry.title: TR Release Warning - FOT_COMMON037 during Tax Code Creation
entry.content:
Hi,

I am currently trying to create a new Tax Code for VAT  in "Define Tax Codes for Sales and Purchases " Customizing, but when I try to create the new tax code, the system show the message "Transport request DA4K900003 must be released before changes are allowed. Message no. FOT_COMMON037".

This specific Transport Request (DA4K900003) is associated with "BC Initial Scope" configuration. Before releasing the TR, I performed a consistency control, which generated a long list of warning messages, including:

Requests could not be read
No entries found. See long text.
No transport entries available for object FINSV_FICO_CURRC and type V.
Final Status of the B-Inp Session will be read; expect longer runtime
Subobject ANLAGENNR does not exist
Interval limit starts with a special character. Interval AUFTRAG INTERVAL
No transport entries available for object V_T8G30B and type V.
No transport entries available for object V_T8G41B and type V.
No transport entries available for object V_TB038 and type V.
No transport entries available for object V_TKA01_GD and type V.
No transport entries available for object V_TKA02 and type V.
No transport entries available for object V_TKA09_CL and type V.

My main concern is: What are the potential consequences of releasing this Transport Request (TR) while these warning messages are present?

Is it generally safe to proceed with the release in this context (BC Initial Scope TR), or do these warnings indicate a significant risk of missing configuration or data inconsistency that could lead to errors in the target system?

Any guidance on this particular error (FOT_COMMON037) or the warnings would be highly appreciated.

 

Thank you in advance for your insights.
Best regards,
An

entry.title: Outbound delivery DTR not replicated in EWM Public cloud
entry.content:
Hello,

 

I have some users which request to change the stock status with the wrong App.

It creates outbound delivery (type DTR), but some of them where not replicated in EWM.

There is nothing in the queue. 

And in S4, I get the message "Delivery can no longer be changed due to the warehouse processing status"

How I can clear these outbound deliveries ?

Thanks,

Emmanuel.

When I use the app "Post Bills of Exchange Presentation Document", I get the following message "You are not authorized to use transaction FBW3". Am I missing a role? Which one?

Thanks, 

Sabrina

entry.title: Multiple Questions Regarding SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Features for Japanese Manufacturing Company
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,
We are currently implementing SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud for a Japanese manufacturing company and have several questions regarding standard functionality. We would appreciate your guidance on the following points:

1. ISO20022 Format Support for Foreign Remittance
We currently output remittance data and upload it to the bank's web banking system for foreign payments.

Question: Does the remittance data output support ISO20022 format?


2. Manufacturing Cost Report (Cost of Goods Manufactured Statement)

Question: Is it possible to output a Manufacturing Cost Report as a standard feature?
If not available as standard, what alternative solutions would you recommend (e.g., custom reports, SAP Analytics Cloud, API integration)?


3. Financial Statements Operation for Japanese Companies
We need to understand best practices and localization support for Japanese accounting requirements.
Questions:

Are there Japanese-localized versions of standard financial statements available in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?
How do other Japanese companies typically operate financial statements, including configuration, output methods, and workflows for the following:

Balance Sheet (BS)
Profit & Loss Statement (PL)
Journal Entries (仕訳帳)
General Ledger (総勘定元帳)
Other required financial statements for Japanese GAAP compliance

 


4. Customer Invoice Creation - Transaction Date and PDF Attachment
Regarding customer invoice creation in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud:
① Actual Transaction Date

Current situation (SAP ECC): We can only retrieve and output the "invoice issue date" (document date), not the actual transaction date
Desired requirement: We need to retrieve and output the actual transaction date (the date when the transaction occurred) on customer invoices
This is required under the accrual basis accounting principle
Question: Is it possible to capture and output the actual transaction date in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?

② PDF Document Storage

Question: Can SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud store, manage, and output invoice PDF files as supporting documents/proof of transaction?


Any guidance, documentation links, or best practice recommendations would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you in advance for your support.
Best regards,

entry.title: Test equipment management in S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition
entry.content:
Hi QM Experts,

I am looking for a best practice process for test equipment management in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud. Has anyone already gained experience in this area? I think this process is not available in Public Cloud Edition.

The inspection typ 14 is also not  available in Standard Edition.

Thank you for your feedback!

Regards Sam.

entry.title: Difference in Business Partner Tabs Between PRD and TEST system
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We are facing a inconsistency between our PRD and TEST environments related to the display of the Business Partner (BP).

Description:

In PRD, when displaying the Business Partner. We can see the tabs Company Codes and Purchasing Organizations under the Business Partner role.

However, in TEST, for the same BP grouping and category, these tabs are tabs are not visible. We only  see the Basic Data, Address, Roles, Bank Accounts, and Attachments are visible.

Could anyone please suggest why there is a difference in the BP tabs display between the PRD and TEST systems?
Thank you

entry.title: Unable to create New Entries for “Define Change Documents, Collective Purchase Requisition.
entry.content:
Hi Team,

The user has access to the Application Implementation Activities, but in the IMG activity
“Define Change Documents, Collective Purchase Requisition, MRP relevance” (under menu -edit), the user is unable to add new entries – the New Entries button is greyed out.

The user performing this change has unrestricted access, for the role SAP_BR_BPC_EXPERT, yet the button remains disabled.

Could someone help explain:

 Why would the New Entries button be unavailable in this customizing node? 


    Are there additional authorizations (catalogs/roles) or system settings required besides the role?

    Please find the screenshots for your reference.

 

Regards

 

Sandeep

entry.title: Restrict only “Unblock for Payment” in Manage Supplier Line Items app.
entry.content:
Hi Team,

In the app Manage Supplier Line Items (Public Cloud) our business requirement is:

  • Allow the “Block for Payment” tab for users.

  • Restrict the “Unblock for Payment” tab so users cannot unblock line items.

What we have done:

  • We set the “Authorization Group for Journal Entry Document Type” to Not Maintained.

  • Result: Both “Block for Payment” and “Unblock for Payment” tabs got restricted (i.e., inaccessible).

Our question:

  • Is it possible to allow only “Block for Payment” and restrict only “Unblock for Payment”?

  • Are there additional authorisations or configuration settings (catalogues/roles) in Public Cloud which support this level of segregation?

  • Any SAP Notes or documentation for this scenario in Public Cloud?

Thanks in advance for your guidance!

Thanks & Regards

Sandeep

entry.title: Required Scope Items for ISO 20022 Payment File Output in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
entry.content:
We are considering implementing a process in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition to output payment files in ISO 20022 format (Pain.001, etc.) for foreign remittances and manually upload them to the bank's web banking system.
We’re located in japan.

After reviewing the Help Portal and Best Practices documentation, I found conflicting information regarding the mandatory requirements:
Information Found:

"Advanced Payment Management" Help: States that SAP Multi-Bank Connectivity activation is required
"Advanced Payment Management (4MT)" Best Practices: States that SAP Multi-Bank Connectivity (16R) is not mandatory but strongly recommended
"Bank Integration via File Interface (1EG)": Supports ISO 20022, can be used without Multi-Bank Connectivity with additional configuration
"Basic Payment Management": Uses a data model similar to ISO 20022

Questions:
To output payment files in ISO 20022 format (Pain.001, etc.), are the following scope items mandatory?

Advanced Payment Management (4MT) - Required?
Advanced Bank Account Management (J77) - Required?
Advanced Cash Processing (J78) - Required?
SAP Multi-Bank Connectivity (16R) - Required?

Or is it possible to output ISO 20022 format files with only "Bank Integration via File Interface (1EG)"?
If anyone has experience with this, I would greatly appreciate your insights.

entry.title: Unable to resolve error "Message no. V2127" in Assign Sales document types permitted for sales areas
entry.content:
Dear experts,

I am faced with an issue that "Message no. V2127" cannot be resolved and I am unable to complete configurations in "Assign Sales document types permitted for sales areas" on the Public Cloud system.

I have created a new distribution channel "90" and 1000|90|10 in addition to already existing 1000|10|10.

I have also completed the below configuration afterwards to define 1000|90|10

SSCUI: 102183 Combine Distribution Channels 

However, when creating entries in the "Assign Sales document types permitted for sales areas" (ID: 102185), I receive a message that it is not allowed.

For the provided procedure, there was no changes made to sales org and division so, I only performed the "Combine Distribution Channels" .

Kindly advise me on what I am missing  and how can this be resolved...

Thank you in advance!

Fujita
